txt.en: 'Have you set foot upon those lovely islands out there? No sense just going out there to look around though. You must have a reason, I tell you. I have some traps out there. If you go out there to look around, check the traps for me. Then you will be living like me. One with the sea. Aye, that is the only life I want.'
Haldil is down by the Cape Docks.\n\nYou should speak to Haldil when you have a moment.
'Well will you look at that? Quite the haul, I do say. I must bring you out on a boat with me some time. You, my friend, are good luck!'
Fish traps can be found around the shores of either of the Cape islands.\n\nYou should check the traps for fish.
Haldil, a local at the Cape Docks, enjoys working on the shore and on the water.
